attributes.action: To help people with a universal income
attributes.additional_details: It’ll help people not worry about money, it’ll help the economy people will have extra money to spend. It’ll help people better themselves by helping them go to school again. It’ll just make people better off and happier.
attributes.background: Help people that are struggling with a universal income system. That pays people a wage for being citizens. Which means not just the rich cane get it everyone can get money. It’ll help peoples mental health and financially support people. And it’ll help the economy out cause people will spend.
